abstract: Today’s headlines: Hearst and Forbes buy social bookmarking start-ups, SpiralFrog starts to test its plan free music downloads, Sprint’s earnings fall as Cisco soars. Yes, there is even another bit from Apple.
snippet: Today’s headlines: Hearst and Forbes buy social bookmarking start-ups, SpiralFrog starts to test its plan free music downloads, Sprint’s earnings fall as Cisco soars. Yes, there is even another bit from Apple.
lead_paragraph: WiMax better be a SuccessMax for Sprint because its current phone business is struggling. The company barely broke even in the second quarter, with new customer growth stalled and heavy investments in its new WiMax network. [Reuters]

headline.main: QuickBits: Sprint Slowdown; Bookmarks Get Bought

abstract: Why assume a newsmaker’s persona? Perhaps because you lack access.
snippet: Why assume a newsmaker’s persona? Perhaps because you lack access.
lead_paragraph: This is our last word on the Fake Steve saga, I hope.
